name: You Got This
description:
"Hey, friend! Can you do me a favor?
 Today is my girlfriend and I anniversary... I need you to replace me at my work.
You just have to move boxes and keep my boss happy. Don't worry, it's pretty easy... You got this."

Controls:

  • Left click to move and interract
  • Left click on yourself to drop hold item (... or human)
  • Escape to quit game

Tip: Don't put the boss in the conveyor belt. He doesn't like it.

Game made for the GMTK - 2020 gamejam with the theme: Out Of Control
